author: newsr.in
title: Would love to make fiction show for television: Farhan Akhtar - newsR
text: From directing a hit like "Dil Chahta Hai" to becoming a rockstar with musical "Rock On!!" and wearing the running shoes as Milkha Singh, Farhan Akhtar has tasted success in his different endeavours and the actor-filmmaker now wishes to make a fiction TV show. Â»
